fields.name: adventurous
fields.description: Our absolute favourite shirt and a must have: the adventurous puffin with its super soft, lightweight cotton fabric and neps in contrast colour has the perfect relaxed fit. Wear it on its own or as a base layer under a cardigan. Made the Puffins way, from organic cotton mixed with recycled polyester and GOTS certified, for a great sustainable tee. T-shirts made from a cotton-polyester mix are more stable and shrink less. They are more durable and also feel lighter.

fields.name: courageous
fields.description: This shirt is a must have: the courageous puffin with its super soft, lightweight cotton fabric and neps in contrast colour has the perfect relaxed fit. Wear it on its own or as a base layer under a cardigan. Made the Puffins way, from organic linen from the EU for a great sustainable tee. T-shirts made from linen make you stay cool in the summer . They are more durable and also feel lighter.

fields.name: helpful
fields.description: Our helpful puffin sweat is a great basic with a twist for your sustainable wardrobe. Made of 100% organic cotton, this sweat is both comfy and soft on your skin. It has a playful design with a Puffin print. The high-quality organic cotton that we use for our sweatshirts is less toxic than conventional cotton, which is better for the environment and better for you. An excellent choice!

fields.name: thirsty
fields.description: We have designed these beautiful ceramic mugs with our favourite little puffin especially for you guys. They have a nice, vintage look and keep your hands cool and your coffee warm.

fields.name: carrying
fields.description: Going plastic-free is made easy, pretty and practical with our new Carrying Puffin. Made from organic cotton, making it soft to the touch and satisfyingly sustainable. Measuring 51cm x 55cm to fit all of your essentials.

fields.name: sunshine
fields.description: When the sun is one the rise you better keep your head protected. The Sunshine Puffin cap keeps you protected when you are outside and enjoying life.

fields.name: breezy
fields.description: Made from 100% extra soft merino wool, this beanie will keep you warm all winter long. This is pure winter luxury.

fields.name: snow
fields.description: Our beautiful Sunshine Puffin beanie is back just in time for the colder seasons! Made from fine merino wool and nylon. This will make you stay warm during the cold winter days.

fields.name: little
fields.description: An essential for any little one's wardrobe, our Little Puffin Bodysuit is perfect for day & night. Crafted with a gentle touch from our signature organic cotton and bamboo fabric. The bodysuit is thoughtfully designed to keep your little one comfortable always with long sleeves & an envelope neckline for easy changes.

fields.name: tiny
fields.description: An essential for any little one's wardrobe, our Tiny Puffin Bodysuit is perfect for day & night. Crafted with a gentle touch from our signature organic cotton and bamboo fabric. The bodysuit is thoughtfully designed to keep your little one comfortable always with long sleeves & an envelope neckline for easy changes.
